costing.translation[0].definitions[0].de: the process of calculating the cost of a future business activity, product etc, or the calculation itself
costing.translation[0].definitions[0].ex: the planning and costing of staffing levels
We were asked to prepare detailed costings for the scheme.
costing.translation[1].definitions[0].de: the process of calculating the cost of a future activity or product, or the calculation itself
costing.translation[1].definitions[0].ex: Railtrack originally said the scheme would cost £100 million, but last year produced revised costings of £350 million.
